reck.corpora
Class CorpusImpl

java.lang.Object
  reck.corpora.CorpusImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable, java.util.Collection, java.util.List, Corpus
public class CorpusImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Corpus, java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable

A corpus that contains a list of documents.
